title.rendered: AT&T CARDING METHOD – “BUY” IPHONE WITH THIS METHOD

content.rendered:
Buy a brand-new iPhone with this method. The methods for payment from AT&T website are via installments or full pay. We want to pay full payment since we will be using a new account and don’t have a history with the account.

We will use the US site since This method works best in US states. You can easily create an account with any of your email you have. Be it yahoo or Gmail to get started.

One Good thing of buying fullz from wcc is that most of the spammed results include mail access. If our scam site was netfilx.com, then we will end up collecting Netflix logins + email, cc details and address info. Most of email password is also used

in other sites. Many users do that. If you get a login try to access the email and find good accounts associated with it.

In order to use this method, you have to be a valid WCC user and have topped up your account in order to buy a card from the site. Due to the scarcity of the Nonvbv Cards (cards without 2fa). There is a min deposit for the site only to keep the real carders on board.

Many users started selling Nonvbv bins, they would create a free account, start browsing for available nonvbv cards and instead of buying, they would save the bins and sell away. To avoid this, top up your account to avoid account deletion. You don’t have to use you funds right away after top-up but you can keep until you find a good Cashout method.


Requirements:

  • Method – the most valuable item in carding. Gladly you have this to work with
  • You should understand the basics of carding
  • NonVbv CC with Fullz – as of now WCC is the only reliable source,
  • At&T account– A valid account, ask admin for one after purchase or you may create one
  • AT&T phone number – Find a random at&t number, you don’t need to have access to it

For easy verification, we will be using a US Account and Fullz. The advantage is that our fullz will come with ssn and dob. With these, you are good to go through the verification. We don’t need any docs to card the smartphone. The trick lies on the correct fullz info. Make sure your fullz are correct and from US

Site: https://signin.att.com/

Steps:

  1. Register and Buy Fullz from WCC

Go to wcc-autoshop.cc and create a new account, fill your email and create password.
Use this link to avoid scam sites: https://wcc-autoshop.cc Many sites try to clone and host this site so make sure you click on the link above or type direct on address bar. Do not search for results. Account creation is free but make sure you top up your account in a day to avoid suspension.


Go to your US country of choice and select Gold Cards. They work best. In my case I will work with US. Make sure you choose a card with full info and nonvbv like the one below.

Make sure you choose the full fullz card, Like the picture above, I chose a card with all checkboxes checked meaning it’s a nonvbv with all info
All cards are live and A balance checker is available so make sure you use it. Will help in making orders and make sure your card can hold the order amount.

  1. Register signin.att.com/

If you got a at&t log from admin, just skip this step. You already have a working account with history

Now to https://signin.att.com/ and create an account according to fullz info. The form will just re quire names and maybe address. Make sure your names match your fullz info since you can’t change names after account creation.

After you fill the names and email address, the state will be filled by default to your current IP location, so make sure you chose a vpn/proxy with the correct state as of the cc holder.

You will be asked to confirm several agreements after account sign up. Make sure to accept all as is mandatory if you want to use the site
No need to read them, just confirm and proceed to the next step

Make sure to fill all basic info in profiles like name, address, confirm your email etc.

  1. Browse for items to card

Since we will be carding an iPhone, browse some different iPhones, make sure to view description and properties. You can spend like 30 mins just browsing the iPhones. When done, add about 3 of them in the cart. They should be different. We will only card one but it’s good to add several


Keep the amount not to exceed $1.5k. My card has about 3k bal. I checked on wcc. Make sure you know your card balance before you proceed to make the purchase. When you buy more than your card allows, they definitely suspect your action since a real owner will know their card balance

  1. Cart options

After about 2 hours, go back to your cart and select one of the iPhones to Cashout. Make sure it’s your desired one. There are plenty of options to choose from when you buy the iPhone since its going to be network locked. Make sure you also choose your correct network you want

I skipped most of these and just continued. You want to make sure you select the accessories you want to add. For insurance, just skip it and continue.

  1. Cart Checkout

After you have selected all your preferences, you will have your total order. Note you will have installments and to cash payment (full payment). Just choose the full since you may not qualify for the installments.
You will have the full order details as follows

After selecting all the specifications of the iPhone, you will be asked to proceed to billing.

  1. Billing options

Now you have your order summary and the full amount you have to pay. At this point your fullz should be ready. With ssn and dob since the site may ask for a credit score when you select a new number. Basically, you can either add a new number or keep your old one. To add one, they will first ask for your ssn and dob to check the credit score. Don’t worry, just input the ssn and dob and soon you are good to go.

Fill your billing and drop address below. The drop should have first and last name same as cc holder. Then on the same state as cc holder. Don’t worry, when they ship to a residential address, they won’t ask for identification since they will ship directly to the home address you inputted, you can also leave a delivery note and tell them to leave the product to any household member they find. Very easy, I have done it may times.

When you select to add new number to the iPhone it will ask you to input for ssn and dob to check credit score. Alternative is to keep your previous phone number to the phone. We can’t use these since we can’t use our phone number for security issues. We will ask for new number and when arrived just trash it.

Enter your ssn and dob from fullz you have. When done checking Enter your cc details

  1. Order summary

Now with everything in place, you will get an order summary to confirm all your settings and update if you need to. Just take a look at the product and make sure all details are correct

.




Here should be the order summary plus the picture of the iPhone you want to purchase.

As said earlier, the total price of the items should be covered by your cc balance. Don’t go beyond your balance and also don’t drain the cc balance. Choose a product that fits well for the balance you have

  1. Place Order

When satisfied with your selection, just click on place order and wait for the order processing to complete. This is not hard if you have followed all the steps carefully. It is good to look like a legit customer. The crucial part of all this method is selecting your drop address. Making sure the names are similar to that of cc holder

  1. Order Confirmation

After some minutes, you will get an order confirmation on the screen and later on you will receive another in the email with shipping notification.

A total summary of paid amount and the card used will be shown

At this point, just wait for order shipping notification from the email. It should arrive as indicated.
